article: no one was killed in the burst so far , '' said ma yongwei , an army officer , ridiculing reports by a certain foreign media that tens of thousands were missing and many bodies seen in a burst on the embankment of the yangtze river at jiujiang , in east china 's jiangxi province .
abstract: foreign media 's death reports on dyke burst at jiujiang untrue
